tiles.title: BanginiPalli
tiles.description: Banginapalli mango, hailed as the crown jewel of Indian mangoes, boasts an elongated form with a smooth, pale yellow skin. Its juicy, fiberless flesh offers a divine blend of tropical sweetness, citrus undertones, and a fragrant aroma. Available during the peak mango season from April to June, it's a true delight.

tiles.title: Rasalu
tiles.description: Rasalu mango, revered in South India, showcases a small to medium size with a golden-yellow hue and occasional blush of red. Its succulent, fiberless flesh embodies a sweet, tangy flavor profile, accompanied by a captivating aroma. Ripening during the summer months, it's a cherished delight for mango enthusiasts across the region.

tiles.title: Himayat
tiles.description: Himayat mango, a prized gem from the Indian subcontinent, boasts a distinctive oval shape with a vibrant golden skin tinged with red blushes. Its luscious, fiberless flesh delivers a harmonious blend of sweetness and tanginess, complemented by a delightful aroma. Savor this exquisite delight during the summer harvest season.
